chatHistory.message: Welcome, John. Your initial property valuation is complete. To proceed with your lending application, please upload the necessary documents.
I need the Certificate of Title, a certified Floor Plan, and your latest Property Tax Assessment.
Understood. I'm uploading the Certificate of Title and Floor Plan now.
Received: Certificate_of_Title.pdf and Floor_Plan.pdf. Both look good. Just need the Property Tax Assessment to complete your file.

Excellent! All documents are verified. Your application is now complete and has been forwarded to our lending team for review. You will be notified of their decision within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your cooperation!

activityLogs.activity: Lending application submitted for final review.
Address updated from '123 Main Street' to '123 Main St'.
Owner name corrected from 'Jon Doe' to 'John Doe'.
Valuation completed by AI model 'ValuProphet v2.1'.

chatHistory.message: Welcome, Jane. Your property is pending verification. To proceed, please upload the Certificate of Title and a recent property tax assessment.
Thank you. The document you uploaded appears to be a scan of a utility bill, not the Certificate of Title. Please upload the correct document.
Sorry, my mistake. Here is the correct one.
The Certificate of Title has been received. However, the owner's name on the certificate ('Jane Smyth') does not match the name in your profile ('Jane Smith'). Please clarify or update your profile.
It's a typo in my profile. How do I fix it?
You can update your name in the 'Profile' section. After that, I will re-verify the document. Your application is currently on hold.
Your lending application has been rejected due to incomplete documentation. Please re-apply when you have all the required materials.

activityLogs.activity: Lending application rejected. Reason: Incomplete documentation.
System flagged document 'Utility_Bill_July.pdf' as incorrect type.
Previous application rejected. Reason: Missing documents.
